team - Variable in class game.Player
An ArrayList of the player's monsters, in the order which they will fight.
TeamCommandLine - Class in commandline
Command line interface to display the Player's team, reorder the team, and rename individual monsters.

teamList - Variable in class GUI.ItemScreen
 
teamList - Variable in class GUI.ShopScreen
 
TeamScreen - Class in GUI
Screen that shows all monsters in the team and allows player to rename monster.
TeamScreen(ScreenManager) - Constructor for class GUI.TeamScreen
Initializes the gui and gets the game environment from the screen manager.
TeamSizeLimit - Class in commandline
A command line interface for checking the size of the player's team and promting them to remove a monster if the team is to large, this should be utilized whenever a monster is added to the team in the command line program.
TeamSizeLimit() - Constructor for class commandline.TeamSizeLimit

toString() - Method in class game.Item
Returns a string representation of the item, containing the item name, and healAmount or buffAmount if applicable.
toString() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
String representation of the monster, including name, health/maxHealth, totalDamage/baseDamage, level and whether the monster is awake.
toString() - Method in class game.Player
Returns a string representation of the player, listing the name, gold, score and team size.
